Text:
FUCK digg and Kevin Rose, and Jay Adelson
paying  for a podcast is like paying for porn'
Well just wait a week and its free.. *sigh*
will seed for a long time,  fuck em dude..  pay to watch a lameass 30 min podcast..  that.. THAT.. is not right..
this is one of those principle things.  they give away everything else for free on rev3, why pay for diggnation, the most underproduced product they put out?  i'll seed at least until it goes public.
